Text: Såg att ingen hade lagt upp den här, så jag tänkte att jag skulle göra ett försök. Hoppas allt funkar bra...

can this be installed with dvd and if so how do i burn  
it.
thanks for any help

Well... the easiest way is to just FTP over the XBMC-folder to your xbox. But if you can´t do that you could put it on a dvd and copy it to the xbox.

But this is not an image, so you will have to burn the "xbmc"-folder manually. When you insert a dvd in your computer you should be given a choice to do so...

Sorry about my slow upload speed... I have a 10Mbit connection and i´ve doublechecked every possible option in utorrent, but there seems to be some problem with my network. It goes up to normal and then down to nothing all the time.. I hope I can fix it soon.

And, uhmm... By the way,  Aidy29, You´ll still need some kind of file explorer program on your xbox (for example Boxplorer, Avalaunch or Unleashx) if you want to copy content from a dvd to your xbox hdd.

Am I the only one having troubles with this version of XBMC?
Sometimes when I click on "My Videos" the Xbox freezes and I have to restart it.

Before this version I had a really old version, which I just deleted before copying this one with my FTP program.

Would love some help or advice. :)

----------------------------------------------------

Är det bara för mig som den här versionen av XBMC buggar? Ibland, inte alltid, när jag går in i "Mina Filmer" så fryses hela mitt xbox.

Hade en gammal version av XBMC innan denna, som jag tog bort från xboxet och sparade en backup av på datorn. Sen körde jag helt enkelt bara över mappen med den nya versionen med ett FTP program.

Skulle va trevligt med hälp eller tips. :)
denna version verkar vara buggig...funkar bara delvis

Huginen, tack för bekräftelsen! :)

För mig funkar den bara felfritt om man använder sig utav "Mina filer", alltså programmets utforskare.

Yep... got the same problem with freezes. But as the xbmc-dudes says, if you want stability use the Final point releases. If you want the most features use the latest svn:s. So its really a matter of what you feel is most important...

A note on the bugs though. I noticed it only seems to freeze if its the first thing you do. Try just moving around a bit (you know checking som setting, look through your files etc), and it should work ok. It has for me...
